title.narrative: Shanxi Inclusive Agricultural Value Chain Development Project

description.narrative: The project will help the Shanxi Provincial Government (SPG) increase income-generating opportunities (IGOs) from selected local specialty agricultural products, to alleviate poverty and narrow rural?urban income disparity, by strengthening agricultural value chains and piloting localized inclusive business mechanism (LIBM). It will (i) assist 19 selected project agribusiness companies and cooperatives (PACs)-which are producers and traders of selected local specialty agricultural products in 17 counties within the province, including 10 poverty counties-to increase and strengthen their operations and value chains; (ii) engage 10 of these PACs in demonstrating inclusive business practices; and (iii) help the SPG design and pilot an LIBM to promote IGOs.

participating-org.narrative: GUANGLING KITANO EDIBLE FUNGUS INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT CO., LTD.
Heshun County Lvhe Ecological Agriculture & Livestock Development Co. Ltd.
Liulin Fuzhongyuan Agricultural Development Co., Ltd.
Quwo Lvheng Agricultural Development Co., Ltd.
SHANXI QINZHOUHUANG MILLET GROUP CO., LTD.

Shanxi Juxin Weiye Agricultural and Sci & Tech Development Co., Ltd.
Shanxi Qierkang Elaeagnus Biological Products Co.
Shilou Shude Jujube Industry Co., Ltd.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
Representatives from at least eight financial institutions report improved understanding of value chain financing by Q4 2021
